Rule.Name: Async methods must return a task.
Rule.Description: Ensures asynchronous methods return a Task and not void.
Rule.Resolution: Do not return void and instead return a Task for {1} in {0}.{1}.

Rule.Name: Methods returning Tasks must end with Async.
Rule.Description: Ensures methods returning Tasks end with Async.
Rule.Resolution: Do not named Task-returning methods without Async appended for {1} in {0}.{1}.
